name: Interstate 64
description:
INTERSTATE 64

Developed for #LOWREZJAM 2017

A short experimental game about a drive that never ends.

Play Length: About 15 Minutes.

Controls:
Up Arrow to begin game.
Left and Right Arrows to move car.
R key to Reset.
F4 to Exit the Game.

Credits:

Inspired by Penn and Teller's Desert Bus.

Car Model by Teh_Bucket: https://opengameart.org/content/sports-car-lowpoly

Street Light/Lamp by ayushsingla991: https://opengameart.org/content/street-lightlamp

Engine Sound by qubodup: http://freesound.org/people/qubodup/sounds/147242/

Car Breaking Sound by Iberian_Runa: http://freesound.org/people/Iberian_Runa/sounds/217542/

Switch Sound by VKProduktion: http://freesound.org/people/VKProduktion/sounds/217499/

Open Field Ambience by drewhalasz: http://freesound.org/people/drewhalasz/sounds/352593/

Radio Tuning by trip_sound: http://freesound.org/people/trip_sound/sounds/190476/

Music "I Don't Understand" by Kakofonous A. Dischord, released by Mixit Challenge: https://mixitchallenge.bandcamp.com/track/i-dont-understand/

Reality Hyper font by Jayvee Enaguas: http://www.dafont.com/reality-hyper.font?l[]=10

Ground and Road textures by Kakofonous A. Dischord
